qa.name: Dr. Eliza Chronos
qa.essence: Brilliant scientist with a heart of gold
qa.appearance: Short, with wild gray hair and thick glasses
qa.clothing: Lab coat over colorful, mismatched clothes

hf.name: Max Swift
hf.essence: Young, eager assistant with a sense of adventure
hf.appearance: Tall and lanky with messy brown hair
hf.clothing: Casual jeans and a graphic t-shirt

json_to_edit.voice_over: With great power comes great responsibility, and time itself was now at our fingertips.
json_to_edit.description: Dr. Eliza Chronos and Max Swift test the time-stopping watch in a busy city square.
json_to_edit.name: Time Freeze Test
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Dr. Chronos and Max use the time-stopping watch to help people and prevent accidents in a busy square.

qa.action: A wide view of the bustling city square with people going about their day.

hf.action: Dr. Chronos and Max walking through the crowd, watch in hand.

tr.action: The time-stopping watch glowing as Dr. Chronos' finger hovers over the button.

xc.action: The entire square freezes as Dr. Chronos activates the watch.

ka.action: Dr. Chronos and Max weave through the frozen crowd, looking for people to help.

fn.action: They carefully move a distracted pedestrian away from the path of a frozen bicycle.

af.action: Max catches flying papers from a businessman's briefcase that had sprung open.

qo.action: Dr. Chronos places a soft cushion under a child who was mid-fall from a bench.

fp.action: Time resumes, and the square comes back to life, with several potential accidents now averted.

edit_command: Remove every second shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: With great power comes great responsibility, and time itself was now at our fingertips.
updated_json.description: Dr. Eliza Chronos and Max Swift test the time-stopping watch in a busy city square.
updated_json.name: Time Freeze Test
updated_json.scene_summary: Dr. Chronos and Max use the time-stopping watch to help people and prevent accidents in a busy square.

label.rationale: we will remove every second shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements of the json intact. this means we'll remove shots with keys "hf", "xc", "fn", and "qo". we'll update the "list_display_order" accordingly and adjust the "number_of_shots" from 9 to 5. the remaining shots will maintain their original content and order.
